title: Vague club/clan recruitment. OCE
body: Today Vague is going public! We are club for OCE players which right now has no requirements and is just for fun. (This may change in the future as we are new). Right now we have a website in progress http://vagueclan.shivtr.com/ and a team speak server which will soon be available to those who want to play with one another. Post down below or Add maskedsora or jimny99 on league of legends. Thanks.

replies.body: @Bespooks, Sorry for not replying earlier, I was busy at the time you replied last night. we are looking for more staff as we are newer than other clubs.

gold 2 im looking for team ranked
xX Legolas
